Package Objects

Class Showing

Object
Showing
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeluxeShowing, GoldShowing, RegularShowing
public abstract class Showing extends Object implements Serializable
Represents an abstract Showing which will be inherited by specific showing classes.
Since:
2022-11-11
Version:
1.0
Author:
Ang Kai Jun
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Showing

      public Showing(Movie movie, LocalDateTime showTime, DayType dayType)
      Creates a new Showing with information keyed in by the Admin.
      Parameters:
      movie - Movie object specific to this Showing.
      showTime - Time of the showing (YYYY-MM-DDT00:00:00).
      dayType - Type of day of the showing (Weekend/ Weekday/ Public Holiday).

      public String getFormattedTime()
      Retrieves the ShowTime of this Showing in dd-MM-yyyy HH:mm.

    • printSeating

      public void printSeating()
      Prints out the seat layout of this Showing. Includes a legend to indicate the seatType. Unavailable Seats are represented with a "X".

    • isAvailable

      public boolean isAvailable(String seatId)
      Returns the availability status of the seat with a specified seatId (boolean). Returns true if seat is available. Returns false if seat is not available.
      Parameters:
      seatId - Id of the Seat.
      Returns:
      availability status of the seat (boolean).

    • getSeatType

      public SeatType getSeatType(String seatId)
      Retrieves seatType of the seat with a specifed seatId (REGULAR, COUPLE, ELITE, ULTIMA).
      Parameters:
      seatId - Id of the Seat.
      Returns:
      seatType of the seat (REGULAR, COUPLE, ELITE, ULTIMA).

    • assignSeat

      public void assignSeat(MovieGoer movieGoer, String seatId)
      Assigns an available seat to a MovieGoer.
      Parameters:
      movieGoer - MovieGoer who is assigned the seat.
      seatId - seatId of the booked seat.

    • unassignSeat

      public void unassignSeat(String seatId)
      Unassigns a seat with a specified seatId.
      Parameters:
      seatId - seatId of the seat to be unassigned.

    • getSeatLayout

      public Seat[][] getSeatLayout()
      Helper function used to return the seatLayout.
      Returns:
      the seatLayout for this Showing.
